entities.name: snape
entities.description: A person who overheard a prophecy and carried news to Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story who is being hunted by Harry's parents.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: One of Harry's parents who was hunted by Voldemort.

entities.name: james
entities.description: Harry's father who was hunted by Voldemort.

entities.name: peter pettigrew
entities.description: A person who sent news to Voldemort along with Snape.

relationships.description: Snape carried the news of the prophecy to Voldemort.
Snape and Peter Pettigrew sent news to Voldemort together.
Snape's actions led to Lily being hunted by Voldemort.
Snape's actions led to James being hunted by Voldemort.
